basics.name: Ransome Coleman
basics.label: Web Architect and Developer
basics.summary: Developer, architect and leader with 15 years experience primarily in Web Development.

awards.title: Codie Award
awards.summary: Best Education Game or Simulation in 2013 for Platinumath

work.name: PSLGroup
work.position: Senior Manager, Integrations and Software Architecture
work.summary: The go to person for technical solutions on high profile projects in the company's largest grossing division.
highlights: Remotely managing a team of 5 with 4 direct reports, trained over 15 developers and served as technical leader for 8 years
Leading migration from a multi-tenant Drupal to AWS by architecting the new system and building a roadmap to transition features
Introduced cloud and automated testing, built foundations for both
Architected and developed a multi-tenant learning and live event platform that serves thousands of courses from ~50 sites to a quarter million participants a month (Drupal)

work.name: UNCG Division of Continual Learning
work.summary: At DCL we built courses for online classes.  My notable achievement there was to spearhead a multi-tenant solution to features that were common across courses.
highlights: Lead a team of 4 building and supporting 30-50 online courses a semester
Refactored world's first online game for college credit, Econ201
Consolidated course services under a custom multi-tenant framework

work.name: Core Search Group
work.summary: The best recruitment agency on the planet. I helped cool people get good jobs in a client-centric, fresh approach to recruiting.
highlights: Interviewed world class developers and built a system to coach candidates

work.name: Moonlighting
work.summary: Over the years I've taken on a few freelance gigs, both developing and managing subcontractors.  My main client worked with the Department of Education to build educational games.
highlights: Built games and prototypes for clients using Unity3D, HTML5/JS and Flash
Coordinated with other developers to meet demanding project timelines
